name: Initiative for Symbiosis Between Humans and Animals (ISHA)

address: F-302, Versova Sameer Society, Vaswani Marg, Off J.P. Road

briefDescription: ISHA is an organisation working for the welfare of street animals in Mumbai.(Rescue,Treatment, Rehabilitation of Street Animals).Besides rescuing & treating injured & sick street animals & also Sheltering Disabled Street Animals, Our focus is towards Sheltering and providing a Permanent Shelter for Physically Challenged Animals and Aged Animals Land for our works is our immediate need to serve both Urban & Rural areas. Currently, our work is in Mumbai & occassionally Pune. We hope to extend help to companion animals(cats and dogs) in the interiors of Maharashtra.ISHA has successfully rehabilitated street cats and dogs.
